com.github.sanity4j.workflow.tool

Class AbstractToolRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.sanity4j.workflow.tool.AbstractToolRunner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkUnit, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CheckStyleRunner, JaCoCoMergeRunner, JaCoCoRunner, Pmd5Runner, PmdCpd5Runner, SpotBugsRunner

    public abstract class AbstractToolRunner
extends java.lang.Object
implements WorkUnit
    AbstractToolRunner provides a properties-driven way of running external tools.
    Since:
    Sanity4J 1.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis

        the additional configuration classpath for the tool.

      • getToolJars

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.String> getToolJars()
        Returns:
        a list of paths to all the jars needed to run the tool.

      • getToolResultFile

        protected java.lang.String getToolResultFile()
        Returns:
        the file path where the tool should place it's output.

        Returns:

      • getParameterMap

        protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getParameterMap()
        Subclasses may override this method to add any additional parameters specific to the tool.
        Returns:
        a map of parameters to use for replacing configuration tokens.

      • runTool

        protected abstract void runTool(java.lang.String commandLine)
        Subclasses must implement this method to actually run the tool.
        Parameters:
        commandLine - the tool command line.

      • run

        public void run()
        The entry point for the work unit. This implementation looks up the command line necessary to run the tool, then calls runTool(String).
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • setConfig

        Sets the QA configuration for the current run.
